long_description: The durable Patagonia Adze vest offers core protection from the worst wind, combining wind-blocking fabric with a moisture-wicking grid fleece backer that helps keep you warm and dry in cold weather. Polartec(R) Windbloc(R) stretch-woven polyester soft-shell fabric stops wind; Durable Water Repellent finish resists precipitation. Grid fleece backer warms and wicks moisture. Microfleece-lined neck and windflap provide next-to-skin comfort. Drawcord hem seals out drafts and holds in heat. The Patagonia Adze vest features harness- and pack-friendly hand pockets and an internal zip chest pocket, all with smooth, reverse-coil zippers.
short_description: The durable Patagonia Adze vest offers core protection from the worst wind, combining wind-blocking fabric with a moisture-wicking grid fleece backer that helps keep you warm and dry in cold weather.
